channel.title: How do i make an rsps?
channel.description: [b][font=arial black][size=24pt]ok so im probably not going to get good responses since im a new member, but i would like to know if someone can help me with making and rsps. i have EVERYTHING i need to make an rsps but i just cant piece it together because i know almost nothing about java and computers but im trying to learn. i know its stupid for someone like me to want to make a rsps since i know nothing about computers, but im a fast learner and if someone would be willing to show me what to do i would be EXTREMELY grateful.[/size][/font][/b]

item.title: How do i make an rsps?
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Go to the server tutorials section and check the stickied topics near the top, should be a tutorial on ‘How to make your server’ or something similar.

Your friendly fuhur cookies was here:
The tutorial is: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make an rsps?

item.title: How do i make an rsps?
item.dc:creator: @chocothunda chocothunda
item.description:
@chocothunda wrote:

Go to Barnes and Nobles. Buy the book “Java for Dummies”, start at page one, and read to page 1000. That will help a lot. Open those files up, and play around with them. Thats how I learned. Trial and error.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make an rsps?

item.title: How do i make an rsps?
item.dc:creator: @zeeloph1 zeeloph1
item.description:
@zeeloph1 wrote:

im pretty sure i do cause i remember downloading a java thing but it didnt seem like nothing happened. i have a client base and allthat i have all the tools like shopmaker’s, compilers, npc creators, item creators etc.but i just dont know what to do with all of it and i just dont know where to start. thats my main problem i just dont know where to start and how. if some on could make a vid (or a couple) or just tell me what to step by step that would be nice. im aware that its alot to ask of you guys to help me this much, because i know you all have better stuff to do, but if you could i would be so happy.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make an rsps?
